me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit

Class Utilities.Items.Potions

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.Utilities.Items.Potions
  • Enclosing class:
    Utilities.Items

    public static final class Utilities.Items.Potions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods involving potions and potion effects. This class assumes that if an effect is not negative, it must be positive, and that all effects are either positive or negative.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Method Detail

      • isPositive

        public static boolean isPositive(@Nullable
                 org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effect)
        Determines if a potion effect is a positive effect.
        Parameters:
        effect - The effect to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the effect is a positive or "good" effect. If effect is null, the return value will be false.

      • getPositiveEffects

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType> getPositiveEffects()
        Gets all positive potion effects known to this plugin.
        Returns:
        An immutable set of all known positive potion effects.

      • getNegativeEffects

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType> getNegativeEffects()
        Gets all negative potion effects known to this plugin.
        Returns:
        An immutable set of all known negative potion effects.

      • isNegative

        public static boolean isNegative(@Nullable
                 org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effect)
        Determines if a potion effect is a negative effect.
        Parameters:
        effect - The effect to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the effect is a negative or "bad" effect. If effect is null, the return value will be false.
